本月初，

Good, knowledgeable sources make this reporting possible, and we take their trust seriously. If you have more to share about what’s happening at Sonos or other tech brands, you can message Chris Welch confidentially and securely with Signal at chriswelch.01 or 845-445-8455. Alternatively, you can reach Welch via email at welch@theverge.com or through Instagram或者.
